english.segment1: I know a girl whos growing up too fast. Shes stuck between her future and her past. Cause shes just a baby but the doctors say. Shes got a baby on the way
english.segment2: And now the devastation makes her start to cry. How could this be happening she wonders why. But theyre talking options like its just another day. And the choice is hers to make
english.segment3: Theres a life inside you. Theres a beating heart. Theres a child of wonder. Shining like a star. Theres a life inside you
english.segment4: I know a boy whos all caught up. In his addictions and theyre tearing him up. And now hes hearing voices telling him its time to let go. But if I could talk to that boy. I would die for him to know
english.segment5: We all arrive here in this place. Imperfect people in need of grace. But thats why God sent His only Son to die. So that every broken heart could have a life inside. So, just open up your broken heart. Can you feel it
